actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 1052, the Committee of the Whole proceeded with 10 minutes of debate on the Houlahan amendment No. 6.

An amendment, offered by Ms. Houlahan,  numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 118-407 to require the Advocate for Small Business Capital Formation to include in its report to include the effects of the failure of Silicon Valley Bank on community banks and small business lending.
The House resolved into Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union for further consideration.
Considered as unfinished business. H.R. 2799 â€” "To make reforms to the capital markets of the United States, and for other purposes."
The House proceeded with one minute speeches, which by direction of the Chair would be limited to 5 per side of the aisle.
The Chair designated Mr. Tonko to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Speaker announced approval of the Journal.  Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Reverend Sean Raftis, St. Charles Borromeo Church, Whitefish, Montana
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
